name: mulne0bad
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)))

stmt.origin: mpbird(w0, wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)))
-| wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: A factor of a nonzero complex number is nonzero. Partial converse of ~ mulne0d and consequence of ~ mulne0bd . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
